name: ECPAT Belgium
goal:
ECPAT Belgium is the Belgian official member of ECPAT International. Our mission is to eradicate the sexual exploitation of children.

We implement a wide range of activities among professionals, individual citizens and children/adolescents :
1) awareness-raising/prevention such as trainings, campaigns, etc.
2) advocacy at national and European level
3) research
In all our activities, youth participation is an important component such as multi-stakeholder collaboration.
euInitiatives: ECPAT Belgium acts as the EU Brussels Office of ECPAT International. We follow initiatives, policies and legislation relating to sexual exploitation of children (ex: implementation of Directive 2011/93/EU or Directive 2011/36/11)
